title: Ola EV captures 92% market share in premium scooter segment
description: Bengaluru-based Ola Electric, India's largest electric vehicle manufacturer on Thursday said that its penetration in the premium scooter segment (units costing Rs 1 lakh and above ex-showroom price) has grown to over 92% from 36% before it announced its entry in the segment in 2021.
